item.title: Aded Market Data API
item.description: https://www.marketdata.app - API](https://www.marketdata.app) - Provides real-time and historical financial data for stocks, options, mutual funds, and more. The Free Forever API tier allows for 100 daily API requests at no charge.

item.title: feat: add nx cloud to ci cd
item.description: https://nx.dev/ci - - Nx Cloud speeds up your monorepos on CI with features such as remote caching, distribution of tasks across machines and even automated splitting of your e2e test runs. It comes with a free plan for up to 30 contributors with generous 150k credits included.

item.title: Update README.md (Added free tool)
item.description: https://imgbb.com/ - ImgBB is an unlimited image hosting servce. Drag and drop your image anywhere on the screen. 32 MB / image limit. Revive Direct image links, BBCode and HTML thumbnails after uploading image. Login to see the upload history.

item.title: Update SmartParse perks
item.description: https://smartparse.io - SmartParse is a data migration and CSV to API platform that offers time- and cost-saving developer tools. The Free tier includes 300 Processing Units per month, Browser uploads, Data quarantining, Circuit breakers, and Job Alerts.

item.title: added fonts.xz.style
item.description: https://fonts.xz.style/ - and open source service for delivering font families to websites using CSS.

item.title: Add SmartParse
item.description: https://smartparse.io - SmartParse is a data migration and CSV to API platform that offers time- and cost-saving developer tools. The Free tier includes: Up to 300 processing units, Browser uploads, Data quarantining, Circuit breakers and Job Alerts.

item.title: cyclicsh is shutting down effective may 30
add free limit
item.description: https://www.leiga.com/ - Leiga is a SaaS product that uses AI to automatically manage your projects, helping your team stay focused and unleash immense potential, ensuring your projects progress as planned. Free for up to 10 users, 20 custom fields, 2GB of storage space, Video Recording with AI limited to 5 mins/video, Automation Runs at 20/user/month.

item.title: Moved ConnectyCube to BaaS
item.description: https://connectycube.com - Unlimited chat messages, p2p voice & video calls, files attachments and push notifications. Free for apps up to 1000 users.
